Entries.5000001: ItemHarvest/Baby Steps/Parsnip is a recommended crop for novice farmers./Harvest 30 parsnips./24 30/-1/1500/-1/true
Entries.5000002: ItemHarvest/Fresh Salmonberry LunchBox/It's the Salmonberry season starting today. Go around the village and collect them, it'll help./Gather 20 Salmonberry/296 20/-1/300/-1/true
Entries.5000003: ItemDelivery/Healthy Eel/Evelyn asked for two eels to make delicious fried eel./Give Evelyn two eels./Evelyn 148 2/-1/500/-1/true/Oh my, what fresh eels, just looking at it makes me feel healthy!#$b#Here's some warm tea. Could you wait while I cook this?[614]#$b#I've finished cooking the eel. It's hot, so be careful. Go on, try it.[225]$h
Entries.5000004: ItemDelivery/Birthday Present For A Sister/Haley wants to prepare a special birthday present for Emily./Give Haley An Aquamarine/Haley 62/-1/400/-1/true/Oh, what a beautiful blue light! I really like this. Thank you, I won't forget it.
Entries.5000005: Building/Responsible Cattle Rancher/Build a silo if you want to comfortably store hay for animals. Give Robin the necessary materials and money for construction./To build a silo./Silo/-1/100/-1/true
Entries.5000006: ItemDelivery/Jas' Request/Jas wants to make a clams necklace for Marnie. pick up some beautiful clams and give them to jas./Give jas five clams./Jas 372 5/-1/0/-1/true/Wow, they're so white and pretty! I'm going to make a pretty necklace with this. She'll be happy, right?#$b#This is a baked pink cake. Thanks for your help, @.[221]$h
Entries.5000007: LostItem/Pierre's Glasses/Pierre drank too much yesterday and lost his glasses somewhere./Find Pierre's Lost Glasses./Pierre 170 Town 22 15/-1/250/-1/true/You found my glasses! Oh no, my glasses are broken!#$b#What the hell happened yesterday...$s#$b#Ouch, my head! I guess I have no choice but to get new glasses then.$s
Entries.5000008: ItemDelivery/Bat Problem/Bats are harming the village crops. Bring Bat Wings to Lewis as trophies./Give Lewis 20 Bat Wings/Lewis 767 20/-1/1000/-1/true/Hey, that's pretty bat ass!#$b#I won't have to worry about bats for a while. Thanks for your hard work, @.
Entries.5000009: ItemDelivery/High-Protein Routine/Alex needs protein to train his muscles, and eggs are cheap and tasty protein food./Give Alex 14 Big White Eggs/Alex 174 14/-1/2200/-1/true/Wow, these are really big, I thought they were dinosaur eggs! I'll ask grandma to make me omelets for dinner from now on.
Entries.5000010: ItemHarvest/Fruits? Vegetables?/People are divided over wether tomatoes are fruits or vegetables, but everyone will agree that spaghetti with tomato sauce is really delicious. Try growing some tomatoes on your farm./Harvest 20 Tomatoes/256 20/-1/1000/-1/true
Entries.5000011: Crafting/Respect For Nature/If we want to protect nature, we must make recycling a habit. Even things that seem useless can be valuable again./Make a Recycling Machine./20 true/-1/100/-1/true
Entries.5000012: ItemDelivery/Dog Days/Jas looks tired from the heat and has no strength to play. Why don't you buy her a cold snack?/Give jas an Ice Cream./Jas 233/5000013/300/-1/true/How did you know I liked strawberry ice cream?#$b#It's so sweet, cold and delicious! Thank you!!$h#$b#Are you wondering what vincent's favorite flavor is? He likes grapes!
Entries.5000013: ItemDelivery/Dog Days/Vincent looks tired from the heat and has no strength to play. Why don't you buy him a cold snack?/Give vincent an Ice Cream./Vincent 233/-1/300/-1/true/Wow, it looks delicious! My mom doesn't buy me this often...#$b#@, you're the best! Hehe.$h
Entries.5000014: ItemDelivery/Wizard's Pot/The wizard is trying to study a certain potion, but they're running out of purple mushrooms./Give the Wizard 3 Purple Mushrooms/Wizard 422 3/-1/3000/-1/true/You brought it right on time. Thanks to you, I can continue my research.#$b#This will certainly be a good thing for Marlon and the adventurer Guild.
Entries.5000015: LostItem/Elliott's Memories/Elliott's precious watch decoration has been lost. He looks heartbroken, can you help him?/Find Elliott's lost Topaz./Elliott 68 ArchaeologyHouse 17 5/-1/500/-1/true/It's not an expensive jewel, but it's an ornament filled with memories, it's very precious to me...#$b#What you did for me is very meaningful. Thank you, @.
Entries.5000016: ItemDelivery/Undying Love/George needs a bouquet of fairy roses for Evelyn./Give George 10 Fairy Roses/George 595 10/-1/5000/-1/true/Fairy roses have a beautiful appearance, and a very sweet scent.#$b#Maybe that's why Evelyn loves this flower so much?#$b#Thanks to you, I can make my wife happy today with this gift! Thank you.
Entries.5000017: ItemDelivery/Sweet Maple Syrup/Jodi wants to buy quality maple syrup./Give Jodi A Maple Syrup/Jodi 724/-1/500/-1/true/Thank u! If i put this maple syrup on, it will be delicious even if it's not cooked. hoho.#$b#Now, would you like to try the pancake I just made?[211]$h
Entries.5000018: Crafting/To Make A Keg/If you want to make big money, a wine business could be a good choice. Craft a keg to get started./Craft a keg./12 true/-1/1000/-1/true
Entries.5000019: Building/Build A Mill./Wouldn't you like to process your own wheat and sugar beets into flour and sugar respectively? Well, if you have a mill, now you can! Provide Robin with the money and materials to build a mill for you./Build A Mill./Mill/-1/100/-1/true
Entries.5000020: ItemDelivery/A Cozy Wool Blanket/Caroline is sensitive to the cold, she wants a new wool blanket. Emily, who is good at sewing, promised to make Caroline's blanket. Give her the necessary wool to speed up the process./Give Emily 10 wool/Emily 440 10/-1/8000/-1/true/Oh, you brought the wool! Thatâ€™s good.#$b#Now I can make a thick, warm blanket for Caroline.
Entries.5000021: ItemDelivery/Strong Caffeinated Stimulant/Harvey is busy writing a thesis for a medical journal. He needs some strong caffeinated drinks to keep him from sleeping on the job./Give Harvey five triple-shot espresso./Harvey 253 5/-1/8000/-1/true/Oh, my sleepiness disappears as soon as I take a sip!#$b#I am worried that I'll be addicted to this drink in the future.#$b#I better finish my thesis before that happens... *yawn*
Entries.5000022: ItemDelivery/They're Minerals Marie!/Clint wants to create some powerful iridium tools, provide him the materials for it./Give Clint 50 Iridium Ore/Clint 386 50/-1/20000/-1/true/Wow, you must have had a hard time getting this amount of iridium ore. What a hard, beautiful mineral. Thank you! Now, here's your reward.$h
Entries.5000023: ItemHarvest/Cunning Creature/Octopuses are creatures that are hard to see and catch. Willy has challenged you to catch this elusive creature./Catch an octopus by fishing./149/-1/1500/-1/true
Entries.5000024: LostItem/Delivery Mishap/The package of flour that Gus ordered from Juju City was lost during delivery. The saloon's regulars are looking forward to Gus' special fried food, which is a big deal. Find the missing flour for Gus./Find Gus' Missing Wheat Flour/Gus 246 BusStop 33 6/-1/1000/-1/true/Phew, I almost had to serve salad to the guests who visited me on Friday night. That would've been embarrassing.#$b#It's all thanks to you that I'm able to show off my special fried-food today.#$b#Please wait a moment.#$b#Here, that's my special fried calamari. Thank you again for your kindness today![202]$h
Entries.5000025: ItemHarvest/Happy New Year/Your first year in Stardew Valley is almost over. Why don't you bake a nice chocolate cake to celebrate a successful year?/Baking chocolate cake/220/-1/1000/-1/true
Entries.5000026: ItemHarvest/Lumberjack/Because of the cold weather, you need a lot of firewood to keep the stove going all day long. The more wood, the merrier, so get out there and get chopping!/Collect 999 wood./388 999/-1/10000/-1/true
Entries.5000027: ItemHarvest/King Of All Fish/Legend is called the king of all fish. You'll be widely known as the best fisherman if you catch the Legend. To catch this elusive fish, you must prepare proper food and bait./Catching the legend/163/-1/40000/-1/true
Entries.5000028: ItemDelivery/The Jewel And The Cactus/Pam wants to give Penny jewelry, but she says she is too ashamed to give her daughter a present herself./Give Penny a Diamond/Penny 72/5000029/250/-1/true/Uh... Isn't this a diamond? Mom wanted to give it to me?#$b#I don't know how she bought me this expensive jewelry when she doesn't have a lot of money.$s#$b#I also have a present for mom. If you don't mind, could you do me a favor?#$b#My mom really likes the cactus fruit. She used to talk a lot about the cactus fruit she ate in the desert.#$b#Could you please get the cactus fruit from my mom?
Entries.5000029: ItemDelivery/The Jewel And The Cactus/Penny wants to repay her mother by giving her Cactus Fruit found in the desert./Give Pam 10 Cactus Fruits/Pam 90 10/-1/1500/-1/true/Kid, you told Penny that I bought her that diamond, didn't you?$s#$b#I couldn't give you anything, but you always do a lot for me. Sorry, and thank you for being a good friend, kid.$s#$b#And this is cactus fruit, right? Penny gave it to me? Wow, I love these! I'm proud of her. Hahaha! Today is a pleasant day!$h
Entries.5000030: LostItem/Maru's Lost Item/While Maru kept the window open, a crow stole her newest inventions and ran away./Find Maru's Gold Bar/Maru 336 Mountain 46 36/5000031/1000/-1/true/That's my gold bar, isn't it? I've been experiment with it all day today, but I didn't know this would happen.$s#$b#Glad to find this one, but if you also happen to find my iron bar, bring it to me. please!
Entries.5000031: LostItem/Maru's Lost Item/While Maru kept the window open, a crow stole her newest inventions and ran away./Find Maru's Iron Bar/Maru 335 Mountain 71 6/-1/1000/-1/true/You've found all my stuff!#$b#Thanks to you, I can continue tinkering with my gadgets!$h
Entries.5000032: ItemDelivery/New Crops In Spring/Shane, a maniac of spicy food, wants to have a taste of garlic./Give Shane 5 Pieces Of Garlic/Shane 248 5/-1/1500/-1/true/I really like the taste this has in cooking. I'm going to make fried rice with garlic and pepper, my mouth is already watering. *hehe*$h#$b#You worked hard planting this. Here, take this reward.[206]
Entries.5000033: ItemDelivery/Lucky Rabbit's Foot./Leah is very nervous for an upcoming competition. It would be nice to give her something that could help relieve some tension, and luck to go along with./Give Leah the lucky rabbit's foot./Leah 446/-1/2000/-1/true/Wow, this is a rabbit foot, isn't it? It's a very sensible gift!#$b#I'm not afraid anymore because the rabbit's foot is in my hands. It really puts my mind at ease. You're so sweet, @.$h
Entries.5000034: ItemDelivery/A Talented Designer/Emily wants to make a beautiful dress, but she can't get the necessary coral dye for her work./Give Emily 5 Coral/Emily 393 5/-1/1000/-1/true/How beautiful the color of the coral is! This will come out exactly the way I imagined now. You're so kind, @.$h
Entries.5000035: ItemDelivery/For the Gentleman/Clint is interested in skin care. He says he needs red cabbage that is healthy and rich in antioxidants./Give Clint 10 Red Cabbage/Clint 266 10/-1/6000/-1/true/Wow, these are huge. I think with this amount I can eat some every morning for a month.#$b#I like meat, but I need to start thinking about my health. It's depressing...*sigh*$s
Entries.5000036: ItemDelivery/Electrical Necessity/Sebastian's project is said to have been stopped due to computer power problems. Please help him get the job going./Give Sebastian 10 Battery Packs/Sebastian 787 10/-1/20000/-1/true/Hey, you brought it right away. I think I can use my computer long enough now until the thing is fixed. Thank you. @.
Entries.5000037: LostItem/Dwarf's Hat/Dwarf lost his precious helmet while exploring the village at night./Find the Dwarvish Helmet/Dwarf 121 Town 56 68/-1/0/-1/true/That's my helmet! Where did you find that?#$b#Doghouse? dog? What is that? That hairy, tongue-out animal?#$b#ah! I was looking around there yesterday, and I must have left my hat.#$b#This is my favorite hat. It's cool, right?
Entries.5000038: ItemHarvest/Colorful Ore/prismatic shard are the rarest ore in the world. This ore is said to be beautiful enough to be recognized from afar./find a prismatic shard./74/-1/5000/-1/true
Entries.5000039: ItemDelivery/Wedding Anniversary/Demetrius wants to give Robin a box of peaches as a wedding anniversary present. Help him out by providing the Peaches./Give Demetrius 10 Peaches/Demetrius 636 10/-1/5000/-1/true/@, I guessed you came because I could smell the sweet peaches.#$b#I can't give Robin a peach farm, but she'll be happy with this.#$b#It's really top-notch quality. Thanks, @$h.
Entries.5000040: ItemDelivery/An Exotic Dish/Sandy wants to eat Escargot. she doesn't know if it will suit her palate, but she is rather curious about the taste./Give Sandy An Escargot Dish/Sandy 729/-1/2000/-1/true/Oh dear, You came to see me!#$b#Uh, is that a dish of Escargots? It has a buttery smell to it, and it looks a little gross, but I'll try it!#$b#..*Yum-yum*..#$b#Hmm... Oh, I think this is delicious! The texture is surprisingly good. I was really curious about the taste, but thanks to you, I got to taste it. Thank you, dear.
Entries.5000041: ItemDelivery/A Taste Of Remembrance/Sam wants to give Kent a baked hazelnut. he want to present the taste of the memories that his grandmother gave to his dad./Give Sam 3 Hazelnuts/Sam 408 3/-1/1500/-1/true/This smells so savory!#$b#It's a little embarrassing, but I wanted to cheer up my dad even if I couldn't cook.#$b#@, You're good at cooking, so I'll call on you if I ever need help again. hehe..$h
Entries.5000042: LostItem/Abigail's Ancient Sword/Abigail was walking around the forest and heard a strange noise near the sewers. She lost her ancient sword while she was running away./Find Abigail's Lost Ancient Sword/Abigail 109 Forest 92 82/-1/500/-1/true/Oh, you found my sword!#$b#Didn't you hear a strange sound near the sewers? Oh... It sounded like a pigeon? Hmm... Is it?#$b#What? You're wondering where I got this sword? Yesterday I found it while digging and playing in the woods.#$b#Next time, let's practice with this sword together, @#h!
Entries.5000043: ItemDelivery/Big Hard Orange Fruit/Krobus wants to eat a very big orangeish hard-skinned fruit./Give Krobus a Pumpkin/Krobus 276/-1/1000/-1/true/Uh, the fruit I saw back then is right!#$b#p...Pumkin? Pumkin! I won't forget this name.#$b#ah...It tastes just as good as it smells.. It tastes so good!$h
Entries.5000044: ItemHarvest/Green Food/They say green food relaxes your body and mind. How about a cup of warm green tea after a hard farming day?/Make A Cup Of Green Tea/614/-1/500/-1/true
Entries.5000045: ItemDelivery/Special Food In Autumn/Sashimi in autumn is so delicious that even cats who left home come back. Linus wants two fresh Shad for his special autumn dish./Give Linus 2 Shad./Linus 706 2/5000046/1000/-1/true/@, you came! Did you bring what I asked for?#$b#Shad sashimi is the food that I look forward to the most in autumn.$h#$b#Ah, I had a conversation with Robin before, and her son Sebastian said he really liked sashimi...#$b#Just wait a minute, buddy.#$b#Now, here's some fresh sashimi. Will you take this to Sebastian? I'm not really close to him, so he'll feel burdened if I bring it myself.[227]#$b#I want to share joy with my neighbors. Thank you for doing this for me, @.$h
Entries.5000046: ItemDelivery/Special Food In Autumn/Linus wants to share the joy of eating delicious sashimi with his neighbors. Please Bring the sashimi to Sebastian./Bring The Sashimi To Sebastian./Sebastian 227/-1/0/-1/true/Hey, @. Are you here to play?#$b#um? Linus wants to give me Shad Sashimi? How did he know I like raw fish?#$b#I didn't care much for him, but I feel like an ass now.#$b#I'll say my thanks to him directly next time.#$b#@, Thanks for bringing this to me. Let's eat sashimi together.$h.
Entries.5000047: ItemDelivery/Winterization/When winter came, some residents asked Robin to check their boiler, and now she's in need of a lot of ingredients to keep everyone warm./Give Robin 100 Coal/Robin 382 100/5000048/28000/-1/true/Wow, that was quick! Weren't these heavy?#$b#You wonder what I'm going to use coal for? When I check the customers' boilers, I'm filling them with coal. haha.$h#$b#hmm...Now, if i have enough hardwood, i won't have any problems working on it. Please get me some hardwood.
Entries.5000048: ItemDelivery/Winterization/When winter came, some residents asked Robin to check their boiler, and now she's in need of a lot of ingredients to keep everyone warm./Give Robin 100 hardwood/Robin 709 100/-1/7000/-1/true/All right! I can start working right now.#$b#Hmm.. I'll have to check Caroline's house first because she gets cold easily...*Murmur*#$b#oh! I forgot to say thank you. You're a really good friend and neighbor. Thank you!$h
Entries.5000049: ItemDelivery/Bitter But Wholesome/Alex wants to make root honey tea for his grandmother who suffers from a cold every winter./Give Alex 10 Winter Roots/Alex 412 10/-1/2000/-1/true/Well, this root vegetable looks very bitter, but I hope it's that much healthier. Well, if I mix it with honey, it will be delicious.#$b#I hope my grandma doesn't catch a cold this year. I'm going to give her a healthy root tea every day.$h
Entries.5000050: LostItem/Caroline's Tea Party/Caroline lost her favorite tea set. She only remembers having a tea party with her friends at the town hall./Find Caroline's Tea Set/Caroline 341 Town 60 10/-1/1000/-1/true/You found my tea set! Oh, my stuff was behind the town hall?#$b#I had my own strawberry wine while I had a tea party with Jodie, Robin, and Marnie before.#$b#I think we were all drunk and couldn't afford to pack this. hoho.$h#$b#It's my favorite teacup, so I'm glad you found it!$h#$b#Here, this is a tart just baked. Thank you for today, @[234]
Entries.5000051: LostItem/Lewis's Concerns/Louis dropped a bottle of wine near the beach, and the bottle broke into pieces. No matter how much he searches, he says he can't find some of the pieces of glass. You'll have to find it before someone steps on it and gets hurt./Find Lewis' Glass Shards/Lewis 118 Beach 66 22/-1/1000/-1/true/Phew, now that you've found the last piece, I'm relieved.#$b#I've been worried about anyone stepping on it and getting hurt...#$b#Now I just have to remember to put the glass shards in a safe place...
Entries.5000052: ItemDelivery/Hot Mead/Pam is in the mood to drink some quality mead. She says she needs to drink it to get through the cold winter./Give Pam A Mead/Pam 459/-1/2000/-1/true/Oh, I knew I could trust you to get this for me! You're the best in town.#$b#Ooh, the scent of honey is really strong! This is a drink that even bees will love.#$b#Thank you, kid! I will watch TV while drinking this drink tonight. Hahaha!!$h
Entries.5000053: ItemDelivery/Sculpture Of Nature/Driftwood may seem useless, but it can be a wonderful working material for someone who knows its value, and Leah is one such sculptor. Collect pieces of driftwood for Leah./Give Leah 3 Pieces Of Driftwood./Leah 169 3/-1/200/-1/true/Wow! This driftwood has a really cool shape! I think this one belonged to a very old tree. These things can't be easily obtained.#$b#I can make this a beautiful sculpture. @, Thank you so much for saving me here!$h
